151.content: You head is pounding fiercely. You rub your head to make the pain go away. As it subsides, you get your surroundings. You see barbells, treadmills, bicycles, and so on. You know she loves to be in the gym, but first thing in the morning? You joked with her once that she might as well live here. Ok. Time for an early morning workout! A few reps of sit-ups, crunches, pushups, and treadmill will do for today. She said. Kyanna stretches first then starts to do pushups. Kyanna is sweet as they come. You don't think there is a mean bone in her body. The only time you ever saw her mad was when some redhead gave her a hardass time over the way she did her hair. 1512.content:

You can’t keep dodging her forever. You’ll run out of energy before she does. When her foot hits the ground again, you jump onto her shoe. Get off my shoe! She said. She shakes her foot violently and knocks you off. You fall off and watch her foot raise into the air. Just die! She said. You roll out the way just in time.

Kyanna has never come across this before. Her baby boy didn’t like bugs, so she became accustom to crushing them when one got into her house. They all ended up becoming mush under her manicured foot, but this one….. This one wouldn’t stay still and accept its death. Kyanna wasn’t going to be outdone by something that is no bigger than her toe. Ok, bug. You’re not like the rest of them, but you’re going to end up like them. She said. You know that tone in her voice. She’s serious. And when Kyanna gets serious, things get done. And to her, you’re the thing. Kyanna lifts her foot in the air and you move out the way, but before you could even get to your feet, her foot was already coming down again. You roll out the way and manage to get to your feet. You dodge multiple of her stomps, but it’s like each time she misses you, she gets faster and faster.

Kyanna was determined to end you. She pushed herself day in and day out with her exercise routine and she wasn't going to let some insect ruin her self esteem. Even though she wanted to smash you under her shoe, she was getting quite the workout of doing so. She had worked up a little sweat too. You dodge her foot again and quickly get to your feet. After doing all that dodging and rolling, you were out of breath and energy. You were so exhausted that you fell on one knee. Kyanna saw that the bug at her feet wasn’t moving as much and smiled. Run out of gas already? Well you gave me quite a sweat for it, but I think I’ll…….

15531.content:
You awake to the sound of seagulls and moving water. You groggily get up from with the sound of ringing in your ears. As you’re rubbing your head to sooth the pain, you feel the ground shake. At first, you thought it was sense vertigo, but you see a blue boot land next to you. You wonder what it is until you look up to see it’s Celeste walking on the beach. You wonder why she is so big until the rumbling was caused by her walk. Then it hit you. She wasn’t huge, you are shrunken.

You need to get her attention. You won’t last a day on this beach. Not with the crabs, seagulls, and other things looking for a meal. You run over to her as she works on her ship. I think I finally fix the problem. I should be able to get home now. But…..should I leave him behind? He has been wonderfully kind and his knowledge of his planet is vast. She said. You blush a little at hearing those words. You were a know it all in science. I know! There’s enough room in here for two. I can bring him with me! He showed me his world, I can show him mine. It’s the least I can do. She said. But I have to get clearance from the elders. They…..aren’t welcoming to outsiders. She said. Just before she jump into her ship, you latch onto her leg. Ok. Engines are green, weapons are go, nav system is on. Time to go home. She said. With you as an unknown stowaway, Celeste flies her ship into space. The vastness of space…. I rarely have time to enjoy it. I hope the elders will see he is no danger….. She said.

You climb up her leg as she flies the ship to a distant, ice blue planet. You reach up to her shoulder and near her ear. Just as you were about to shout, the ship starts to shake. Entering the atmosphere. Decreasing speed now. She said. With the shaking of the ship, you lose your balance and fall into her lap. I’ll land outside the area. Don’t want to scare anyone. She said. Celeste lands the ship on the hard ice. The ice didn’t give way to the weight of the ship. Ah. Home sweet ice. I wonder how much has changed? It’s been a few years since last been home. She said. As Celeste got out of the ship, you quickly grab hold of the fabric end of her shirt.

Ah. The cold winds of Tendricide. Feels good to be home again. She said. While Celeste was enjoying the cold winds of her planet, you were turning into an icicle. The cold winds of Tendrice were 5x colder than the wind on earth. The cold wind numb the feeling in your hands and you lose your grip and fall onto the hard ice. Not only are you freezing, but now you’re in severe pain. With the cold winds chilling your bones, it felt like all your bones were broken. You wanted to call out to Celeste, but the pain and cold winds stole your breath. All you could do was stare up at her magnificent body. There was little light at the time she arrived, but even in low light, she was beautiful. You hoped she would by chance look down and see you.
15531.title: The blue hunter

155311.content:

W….wait…. You’re not a creature. You’re…..! She said. Celeste eyes widen in fear as she recognized you. You were happy she found you, but you can feel your eyes getting heavy. At least you saw Celeste beautiful face one last time.

When you did close your eyes, Celeste had reach for you. H….His body! Little to no warmth! She said. She had to take action quickly or loss you to the cold. Her village wasn’t far away, but you’d be dead by then. You needed immediate warmth. Celeste quickly removed her glove from her hand and cupped you in her bare hand. Celeste thought it would work, but the heat from her hand wasn’t enough. No! She said. Celeste had compared the winds on her planet to the winds on earth. Even on the coldest day on earth, it wouldn’t compare to a day on her planet. A human would need insulated clothes combined with thermals to survive on her planet. Celeste was racking her brain as how to keep you warm. At this rate, he’s…..! No! I will not accept this outcome! She said determined. She was going to find you warmth, even if it meant any unpleasantries. Keeping you in her pockets weren’t good enough. Her boots were out of the question. You might get warm, but between the hard ice and her walking, you’d splatter. That only left two places. More than enough to provide you with warmth. Celeste had blushed at the thought. The one person she liked between her breast sent a tingle through her body. But she quickly shocks that off. No! No time for that! She said. She knew this was a life or death situation. Celeste brings you to her breast and puts you deep between them. She could feel your ice-cold body between her breast. Celeste’s kind were use to the cold winds. They are able to retain their body heat no matter how cold it got on the planet. Please….. Don’t die…. Please…. She said. Celeste moved quickly to her village. Along the way, she was hoping you would be ok. Her thoughts were of you. She heard about how untrusting humans are.
